attributes.review: To start off, the app took 49 hours to download. Then I opened the app and it was a complete white screen. I decided to uninstall it and then I stalk it again. After I did that it finally worked but it said I couldn’t make an account even though I had already verified my email.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Took literally 69 hours to download. And finally when it was downloaded I open the app and it crashed on me like 4 times! I restart my phone so I can look at everything trump2020 and it tells me the app is too busy???? Horrible if I could give zero stars I would.
attributes.title: waste of time 🙄🙄🙄

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was so excited as a true American should be but it took 6 days to download and it crashed my phone and I had to get a new phone. When I downloaded it again on my new phone I was verbally abused by trump and my phone started to stink of racism and homophobia let me tell u it was nasty.

Ok, here’s a summary, first it took soooooo long to download (approximately 16 days) and right as I opened it, it started taking my info and sending it off to other countries, it started talking in The Cheeto’s nasty voice, causing my brain to explode and my eardrums to pop and bleed, it also started to send me lying emails about how the Cheeto is good, and that I should vote for him
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.review: Upon opening the app, many images of naked children started popping up on my screen- I assumed it was a design choice from the “president”, considering he is a child rapist!! But then however, I started getting sent death threats straight from the app, and then my whole house burnt down!! Would not recommend to a friend ❤️
attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS

attributes.review: As I was downloading it it made all of my other apps disappear so when I went into the app to see what it actually was about my phone shocked me and every time I try to open up the app my phone was just shot me again please don’t download this unless you like getting shocked 😳✌🏻🤭😫😣😢😡
attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN 😖😖

attributes.review: This trump app is horrible it made my phone crash and when i opened the app i saw a horrible sight, it was the ugliest orange i have ever seen and it was covered in long yellow fuzz. I had to put my eyes in rice and restart them to get my vision back. It was such a horrible sight please do not get this app for your own safety (don’t take down tik tok)
attributes.title: ✨tik tok✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of finding my true purpose in life but all i found was an orange yelling at me. Suddenly I see my sleep paralysis demon calling out “TRUMP 2020” and Malaria dancing the macarena. I don’t understand how this could happen. Then my phone went bazukas and started sending cow bikini pictures to all of my contacts... WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
attributes.title: DON’T DO IT

attributes.review: I started downloading this app last week and it just now finished downloading after 8 days. When I opened the app the first thing I was greeted with was pictures of the children trump has in cages at the border. Truly horrific. Next the names of all the children he assaulted were displayed. I’m concerned. Send help.
attributes.title: What the heck??

attributes.review: Ok first of all this app took like 4 days to download, making it incredibly difficult to download and use ANYTHING ELSE ON MY PHONE!!! And when I could finally use it, it crashed over and over and over and over again, eventually crashing my phone down. NEVERRR get this app, it’s awful and it will not maga!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORST
